definition: (toxicology) the state of being capable of counteracting more than one toxin or antigen or kind of microorganism
details:
noun
- (toxicology) the state of being capable of counteracting more than one toxin or antigen or kind of microorganism
= synonyms: polyvalency
- (chemistry) the state of having a valence greater than two
= synonyms: polyvalency, multivalence, multivalency
